rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BBS;6026f067.1501">   <title>Re: ABC transporter meeting and membrane protein workshop, April 2015 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BBS;6026f067.1501</link>   <description> And another meeting on similar, but broader lines (which is in fact joint with the BBS)....<br><br>Membrane Signalling and Transport: Computation and Experiment<br>Lady Margaret Hall, Oxford, UK. April 15-17th 2015.<br><br>http://sbcb.bioch.ox.ac.uk/mgms2015/<br><br>Registration is open!<br><br>thanks..<br><br>Phil<br><br>On 16 Jan 2015, at 12:54, Ian Kerr &lt;Ian.Kerr@NOTTINGHAM.AC.UK&gt; wrote:<br><br>&gt; Dear all<br>&gt;<br>> Apologies for hijacking the apparently accidental distribution of the newsgroup email list, but can I alert people to an upcoming 3-day conference and 1-day workshop and that I am hosting with Freddie Theodoulou in Chester April 15-18, on the subject of ABC transporters and working with membrane proteins [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-16T13:16:18+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Philip Biggin</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BBS;6026f067.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BBS;54bb88b4.1501">   <title>Re: Latest from the BBS </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BBS;54bb88b4.1501</link>   <description> Likewise ditto encore<br><br>[www.heptares.com]&lt;www.heptares.com&gt;&lt;http://www.heptares.com&gt;<br><br>The information in this e-mail is confidential and may be legally privileged. It is intended for the exclusive attention of the addressee stated above and should not be copied or disclosed to any other. If you have received this transmission in error, please make no use of its contents and contact the sender. Contact and registered office address: Heptares Therapeutics Limited, BioPark, Broadwater Road, Welwyn Garden City, Hertfordshire, AL7 3AX. Company No: 06267989 [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-16T13:15:26+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Malcolm Weir</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BBS;54bb88b4.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BBS;d80b7a57.1501">   <title>ABC transporter meeting and membrane protein workshop, April 2015 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BBS;d80b7a57.1501</link>   <description> Dear all<br><br>Apologies for hijacking the apparently accidental distribution of the newsgroup email list, but can I alert people to an upcoming 3-day conference and 1-day workshop and that I am hosting with Freddie Theodoulou in Chester April 15-18, on the subject of ABC transporters and working with membrane proteins respectively [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-16T12:54:27+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Ian Kerr</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BBS;d80b7a57.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BBS;eb6a4254.1501">   <title>Re: Latest from the BBS </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BBS;eb6a4254.1501</link>   <description> Likewise.<br>Jean Thomas<br><br>Sent from my iPad<br><br>&gt; On 16 Jan 2015, at 12:08, Frances Ashcroft &lt;frances.ashcroft@DPAG.OX.AC.UK&gt; wrote:<br>&gt;<br>&gt; I dont think I should have got it either - or some previous email addressed to Tony Watts!<br>&gt;<br>&gt; Professor Frances Ashcroft<br>&gt; Department of Physiology, Anatomy &amp; Genetics<br>&gt; Parks Road, Oxford OX1 3PT, UK<br>&gt;<br>&gt;&gt; On 16 Jan 2015, at 11:41, John Trinick &lt;J.Trinick@LEEDS.AC.UK&gt; wrote:<br>&gt;&gt;<br>&gt;&gt; Tharin<br>&gt;&gt;<br>&gt;&gt; I presume I should have not got the email below,<br>&gt;&gt;<br>&gt;&gt; \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdJohn Trinick<br>>> From: British Biophysical Society Newsgroup <BBS@JISCMAIL.AC.UK> on behalf of Tharin Blumenschein [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-16T12:40:23+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Jean Thomas</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BBS;eb6a4254.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BBS;f8f5acef.1501">   <title>Re: Latest from the BBS </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BBS;f8f5acef.1501</link>   <description> Ditto.<br><br>Dr. C.G. Tate<br>MRC Laboratory of Molecular Biology,<br>Cambridge Biomedical Campus,<br>Francis Crick Avenue,<br>Cambridge CB2 0QH<br>UK<br><br>On 16 Jan 2015, at 12:08, Frances Ashcroft &lt;frances.ashcroft@DPAG.OX.AC.UK&gt; wrote:<br><br>&gt; I dont think I should have got it either - or some previous email addressed to Tony Watts!<br>&gt;<br>&gt; Professor Frances Ashcroft<br>&gt; Department of Physiology, Anatomy &amp; Genetics<br>&gt; Parks Road, Oxford OX1 3PT, UK<br>&gt;<br>&gt; On 16 Jan 2015, at 11:41, John Trinick &lt;J.Trinick@LEEDS.AC.UK&gt; wrote:<br>&gt;<br>&gt;&gt; Tharin<br>&gt;&gt;<br>&gt;&gt; I presume I should have not got the email below,<br>&gt;&gt;<br>&gt;&gt; \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdJohn Trinick<br>>> From: [...]   </description> Newsletter:<br>http://iupab.org/wp/wp-content/uploads/NEWS-61-December-2013compressed.pdf<br><br>Best wishes,<br><br>Tharin    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-16T11:17:15+00:00</dc:date> rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BBS;359bb2d8.1501">   <title>Re: Latest from the BBS </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BBS;359bb2d8.1501</link>   <description> Thanks a lot for this John, and this is looking great - and busy, which is super.<br><br>For the next newsgroup email, can you please include the job description (Associate Professorship of Biochemistry: Biophysics and/or Microbial Biochemistry, in association with a Tutorial Fellowship at Oriel College) advertized at:<br><br>https://www.ox.ac.uk/media/global/wwwoxacuk/localsites/currentvacancies/furtherparticularsforprofessorships/Associate_Prof_of_Biochemistry.pdf<br><br>and Tharin will send the link to the IUPAB Newsletter. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-14T07:13:05+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Anthony Watts</dc:creator>
